Note: For another acrostic on M-O-R-S, see 5245.
Subjects: sermons, verse in; death; translations; acrostics
_description: A unique 4-line tag in a copy of the Fasciculus morum; the only English in the whole Latin text, rendering in English the Latin moralization of M-O-R-S

CULDd1015.Transcription:
M — Merowre of gostly schewyngO — Orologe þat wyl
                    wake fro slepyngys dethR — Robbowre of al erthely
                    þyngS — Somenour to þe heye dom comyng
CULDd1015.Note: Added to lower margin by original scribe.
CULDd1015.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 152.
